sections.title: Concepts of Stream Direction
content: Downstream: Movement of the boat along the direction of the stream (faster).
Upstream: Movement of the boat against the direction of the stream (slower).

sections.title: Speed Formulas (when boat speed in still water is u and stream speed is v)
Formulas (when downstream speed is a and upstream speed is b)
content: Speed in still water = (a + b) / 2 km/hr
